Subject: Re: Retreat
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

OOC: I forgot to respond about the four missiles.

BIC:
Menasor tried to whirl around, but only successfully dodged two missiles.
The remainder struck him in the back with a sickening explosione. He leaned
against Astroblast to gain his ballance. He was considerably weaker now,
and furious, but he knew that now was not the time for this anger. He put
what was left of Firearm inside Astroblast, then with his free arm, grabbed
his burnt arm, trying to ease the pain.
